tweet: Look,  we’re hearing a ton of spin on this. Here’s the bottom line: this is a serious issue and it warrants serious action. Mr. Manafort lied to Congress – and we need to know why. I’m monitoring this situation closely. https://on.wsj.com/2KyCMhd
